fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Budget, Trade, Competition, Taxation, Single market, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Common Consolidated Corporate Tax Base (CCCTB), Taxation of the Digital Economy, TiSA, TTIP
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit: CEP is an international nonprofit nonpartisan economic policy think tank for sustainability. We formulate and promote economic policy solutions that strengthen individual opportunity, social cohesion and environmental stability. We pursue goals, not ideologies; we believe in the effectiveness of markets as well as in the need for appropriate policy frameworks; and we focus on bold but pragmatic and concrete steps rather than grand redesigns. Our impact is reflected in policy change.
